https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pLLSkXJ0qXqV1wdBveT7fitRl4F.jpg Leo, an accomplished playboy, neglects his girlfriend and enjoys parties. His girlfriend parts from him and then, when he wants to see her once more, he suffers an accident. He survives, but his whole life is about to change when he becomes wheelchair-bound. Cavalcade
